settings.text: 🧴 Bottle Size: 30ml

Take control of your skin with the helloskin Acne Attack Kit—your ultimate defense against breakouts. This powerhouse bundle includes the gentle yet effective helloskin Cleanser to purify and refresh, the targeted Anti-Acne Serum to zap blemishes and calm redness, and the nourishing Face Moisturiser to hydrate and restore balance. Plus, you’ll get a free set of 3 Original Makeup Remover Puffs to effortlessly cleanse and prep your skin for a flawless routine. Everything you need for clearer, happier skin in one perfect kit!
📦 Orders are typically delivered within 1-3 business days

noticed their skin felt deeply cleansed and refreshed after using the helloskin Hibiscus Clay Mask.

settings.title: Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract
settings.text: Often called the “B o t o x plant,” hibiscus is rich in natural AHAs that exfoliate, smooth texture, and boost firmness—leaving skin brighter, bouncier, and more refined.

settings.title: Kaolin Clay
settings.text: A gentle, mineral-rich clay that draws out impurities and excess oil while preserving moisture—leaving skin balanced, smooth, and refreshed.

settings.title: Allantoin
settings.text: A calming compound that soothes irritation, reduces redness, and supports healing—ideal for sensitive or stressed-out skin.

settings.title: Mauritia Flexuosa (Buriti) Oil
settings.text: Rich in vitamins A and E, this nourishing oil restores moisture and defends against environmental stressors, leaving skin soft, radiant, and resilient.

settings.title: Glycyrrhizic Acid
settings.text: Derived from licorice root, this gentle ingredient calms inflammation, reduces redness, and naturally brightens for a more even, radiant complexion.

settings.title: Tocopherol (Vitamin E)
settings.text: A nourishing antioxidant that strengthens the skin barrier, defends against free radicals, and supports lasting hydration for a smooth, radiant look.

settings.heading: No BS skincare: clean, safe, powerful ingredients only.
settings.subheading: Quality over cash grabs—no unncessary fillers, just potent ingredients for your glow-up.

settings.author: Kate
settings.text: I love this mask! It’s perfect for clearing out my pores and leaving my skin feeling soft and bright. The hibiscus adds such a nice touch—it feels like a spa treatment at home. It rinses off easily, and my skin feels hydrated afterward, not tight. I can tell this will become a staple in my routine!
Learn how to apply your skincare correctly

settings.title: Cleanse
settings.about_step: Dampen your face, apply the helloskin cleanser, and gently massage in circular motions for 30 seconds. Rinse with lukewarm water and pat dry before the next step.

settings.title: Apply your Mask
settings.about_step: Using the included clay mask applicator, apply an even layer of the helloskin Hibiscus Clay Mask to clean, dry skin. Avoid the eye area. Leave on for 10–15 minutes, then rinse off with lukewarm water to reveal a refreshed, radiant complexion!

settings.title: Moisturise
settings.about_step: Apply a pump of the helloskin face moisturiser to your face, massaging in circular and upward motions until fully absorbed.

settings.text: Eco-Friendly ✦ Australian Made ✦ Sustainable ✦ 30-Day Guarantee ✦ Cruelty Free ✦

settings.title: Can this mask help with dull or uneven skin tone?
settings.content: Yes! The hibiscus extract in this mask is rich in natural AHAs (alpha-hydroxy acids) that gently exfoliate and promote cell turnover, helping to brighten dull skin and improve overall tone for a radiant glow.

settings.title: Is this mask suitable for sensitive skin?
settings.content: Absolutely! The Hibiscus Clay Mask is formulated with soothing ingredients like buriti oil, allantoin, and kaolin clay to gently purify without causing irritation. It calms and hydrates while leaving your skin feeling refreshed and balanced. However we still recommend patch testing just to be sure

settings.title: Will this mask dry out my skin?
settings.content: Not at all! While it deeply detoxifies, the mask is infused with hydrating and nourishing ingredients like propanediol and buriti oil to maintain your skin’s moisture levels, leaving it soft and supple after use.

settings.title: How often should I use the helloskin Hibiscus Clay Mask?
settings.content: We recommend using the Hibiscus Clay Mask 1–2 times a week, depending on your skin type and needs. For oily or combination skin, use twice weekly for best results. For dry or sensitive skin, once a week is sufficient to refresh and renew your complexion.

settings.title: How long will it last?
settings.content: With twice daily use, one 50gr glass jar should last about 6-8 weeks, depending on the amount applied per use.

settings.title: How best to Store it?
settings.content: Store your helloskin hibiscus clay mask in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the bottle tightly sealed between uses to maintain its freshness.

settings.title: Do you manufacturer your own skincare or are you white-labelled?
settings.content: All our skincare is made 100% by us and our team of chemists. We do not white-label any of our products, our formulations are 100% created by us,

settings.title: How fast do you deliver?
settings.content: All orders placed before 2PM Monday-Friday are shipped same day from our local warehouses based in Australia, NZ, UAE or US depending where the stock is located.

settings.subheading: It works or your money back.

settings.heading: You’re backed by our 30-day guarantee: Try it, apply it, it works – or your money back!

settings.text: We know skin can be unpredictable, and what works for one might not work for all. That’s why we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee – so you’re always covered.

settings.title: 30-Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.text: Not completely satisfied with our products or results? We're so confident in our products we provide a solid guarantee
